definition: ready to start on sth/about to act
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to approach one's coffin (idiom); with one foot in the grave

sentences.english: Those of you who are weak will be merged.
sentences.chinese: 你們當中財務較弱的銀行將會被合併。

sentences.english: The birth of qu tunes heralded the birth of a new type of musical system.
sentences.chinese: 曲牌的誕生，宣佈了一個新的音樂體系行將誕生。

sentences.english: Pilot to float interest rates starts at CMB .
sentences.chinese: 央行將在招行實行試點，實施市場浮動利率。
分析家預測銀行將裁員二十萬。

sentences.english: Itau and Unibanco release official third-quarter earnings this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週兩家銀行將正式公佈第三季度收益報告。

sentences.english: The sizes of the 28-day loans will shrink early next year.
sentences.chinese: 央行將在明年年初縮小28天貸款的規模。

sentences.english: Thousands of people streamed past the now moribund check points.
sentences.chinese: 數千德國人湧到行將就木的檢查站。

sentences.english: Many small banks will go under as a result.
sentences.chinese: 而許多小銀行將因此破產。

sentences.english: Like that because of a piece of receipt for a loan, forcibly the marriage she and Xi Menqing is terminative.
sentences.chinese: 然又因一張借條，強行將她與西門清的婚姻終結。

sentences.english: Some central bankers will shudder at the thought.
sentences.chinese: 一些央行將對該想法感到驚恐。

sentences.english: This means that the rows will be locked as shared.
sentences.chinese: 這就表示這些行將被鎖定爲共享。

sentences.english: Mr Sengoku was also scathing about Japan’s habit of using public money to rescue bankrupt firms.
sentences.chinese: 由人先生還批評日本用公款救助行將倒閉公司的怪癖。

sentences.english: If the bubble bursts, land prices could plummet, leaving the banks dangerously exposed.
sentences.chinese: 假如泡沫破裂，地價可能暴跌，銀行將暴露於危險中。

sentences.english: The three banks in this town will consolidate and form a single large bank.
sentences.chinese: 本鎮三家銀行將合併組建一個大銀行。

sentences.english: No doubt the big banks will be commenting.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，大銀行將給予建議。

sentences.english: As the dust starts to settle, which banks deserve the most  plaudits?
sentences.chinese: 當塵埃開始落定，哪個銀行將贏得最多喝彩？

definition: timing (of a signal or sequence)/time course
to surge like a gathering storm (idiom)/to grow by leaps and bounds
to restore old way/to return to the past
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
turbulent situation/changing (face, scene, situation, world of etc)
